summary: Represents a classical variable used in quantum circuits, encapsulating either an owned storage location with a name or a reference to an existing classical bit or register. Instances are immutable and hashable, allowing them to serve as reliable identifiers in mappings.
business_intent: Enable consistent creation and management of classical data elements within quantum programs, supporting both newly allocated variables and wrappers around preâ€‘existing classical resources, while ensuring immutability for safe reuse as keys.
